content: double_crochet in the second chain from hook double_crochet in the next 10 chain 3 double_crochet in the next chain continue working back along the foundation chain but do not turn your work double_crochet in the next 10 chain 2 double_crochet in the next chain that already has your first double_crochet 26 sts in round picture 3 picture 2 picture 3 row 2 double_crochet in next st do not join the row mark this stich as the first of the round double_crochet 11 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet 12 2 double_crochet in last st 28 sts in round row 3 double_crochet 13 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 30 row 4 double_crochet 14 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 32 row 5 double_crochet 15 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 34 row 6 double_crochet 16 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 36 row 7 double_crochet 17 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 38 row 8 double_crochet 18 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 40 row 9 double_crochet 19 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 42 row 10 double_crochet 20 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 44 row 11 double_crochet 21 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 46 row 12 double_crochet 22 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 48 row 13 double_crochet 23 2 double_crochet in next st repeat 1 time 50 picture 4 row 14 double_crochet in each st around 50 repeat row 14 until sock measures the required length see below picture 5 page 3 picture 4 picture 5 uk shoe size length in cm 3 16 4 17 5 18 6 19 7 20 8 21 heel lay sock so that the foundation chain is flat move stitch marker to the left edge of the sock to mark the beginning of the back of the sock the heel double_crochet until you reach the stitch marker picture 6 picture 6 page 4 row 1 double_crochet 25 and leave the remaining sts unworked move stitch marker to the first unworked st chain 1 and turn your work row 2 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 21 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 23 row 3 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 19 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 21 row 4 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 17 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 19 row 5 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 15 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 17 row 6 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 13 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 15 row 7 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 11 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 13 row 8 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 9 decrease in the final 2 sts chain
